Descriptive analysis of coefficient of variation

Source: vignettes/articles/descriptive-analysis-coefficient_of_variation.Rmd
descriptive-analysis-coefficient_of_variation.Rmd

This article shows how to calculate the descriptive analysis of coefficient of variation for emission profile, sector profile, and transition risk profile.

Example company-level output of transition risk profile for cov_emission_rank

companies_id grouping_emission cov_emission_rank
comp_1 all 10
comp_1 isic_4digit 15
comp_1 tilt_subsector 20
comp_1 unit 25
comp_1 unit_isic_4digit 30
comp_1 unit_tilt_subsector 35
comp_2 all 45
comp_2 isic_4digit 50
comp_2 tilt_subsector 55
comp_2 unit 60
comp_2 unit_isic_4digit 65
comp_2 unit_tilt_subsector 70

Average cov_emission_rank per company for emission profile benchmarks 

avg_cov_emission_rank_per_benchmark <- emission_product_example |>
  select(all_of(c("companies_id", "grouping_emission", "cov_emission_rank"))) |>
  filter(!is.na(cov_emission_rank)) |>
  distinct() |>
  mutate(sum_cov_emission_rank = sum(.data$cov_emission_rank, na.rm = TRUE), .by = "grouping_emission") |>
  mutate(distinct_companies_per_benchmark = n_distinct(.data$companies_id, na.rm = TRUE), .by = "grouping_emission") |>
  mutate("Average COV of emission rank for all firms" = sum_cov_emission_rank/distinct_companies_per_benchmark) |>
  select(-all_of(c("sum_cov_emission_rank", "distinct_companies_per_benchmark", "cov_emission_rank", "companies_id"))) |>
  distinct() |>
  filter(grouping_emission %in% c("all", "tilt_subsector")) |>
  rename("group" = "grouping_emission")
Average COV of emission rank for all firms per group
group Average COV of emission rank for all firms
all 27.5
tilt_subsector 37.5

comp_2 NZ 2050 2030 55
comp_2 NZ 2050 2050 60

1.5C RPS_2050 32.5
